data.persona: Being part of this crew is amazing! I get loot, beer, women, rum, everything. And did I forget to mention: GOLD!?
data.description:
You are in the Large Galleon.
The deck of this rather large ship is strong and freshly swapped with tar. Its mast reaches far into the sky like gleaming pillar of hope and freedom. Its sturdy ship made for long voyages with thick planks and strong rails.
There's a deck, a rusty anchor, a mast, a tar, and a barrel of salted herring here.
The boatswain and the merchant are here.

You are carrying a sword and a rope, and wearing a sailor hat, a scarves, a knife, and a Bracelet.

data.short_motivation: I want to put the sword on the deck so the merchant can look at it.
data.mid_motivation: I want the merchant to buy the sword from me before he leaves tomorrow.
data.long_motivation: I want to keep selling loot I find, so that when we get to the city in two months, I can buy barrels of rum.
